_header: The most worthy she is in town
_description: In Praise of Ivy — four quatrains (abab) with ‘Veni coronaberis’ refrain and burden: ‘Ivy chefe off treis it is / Veni coronaberis’

BodEngPoete1.First Lines:
The most worthye she is in towneHe þat seyth oþer do a
                    mysse…
BodEngPoete1.Last Lines:
…fore there shall we nothyng lackveni
                    coronaberis
